name: Baldur Stonebreaker
worldview: Justice above all, Faith guides my hand
quirks: Prays before every battle, Never removes his helmet
backstory: Baldur was raised in a monastery, where he was taught the virtues of justice and faith. He swore an oath to protect the innocent and fight against evil. His unwavering faith and combat prowess make him a formidable foe to those who threaten peace.
